attributes.comment:
It has been brought to my attention that USCIS has a proposal to raise some of
their fees.

The proposed changes include:
1.) Biometrics (fingerprints) from $70 to $80 per person, and
2.) the I-600A from $545 to $670.

Our family is in the process of adopting a child from China. Due to the long
delays, we will no doubt be required to re-file our I-600A to get a new I-171H.

Adoption is a long process that involves great expense. To increase the fees
would present a real hardship for people that have already invested so much of
themselves both emotionally and financially.

I urge you to please NOT increase these fees!!!

Thank you for your time & consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Debbie J. Perkins
